TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRecordUndeclarationHandler

Docs.summary: Provides an interface for custom processing of undeclaring a list item as record.

remarks.para: When a list item is undeclared as record, custom processing handler can be added by implementing the OnUndeclare method in the interface. After the handler has processed the list item (SPListItem), it can choose what happens when it returns CustomHandlerNotRun from the RecordOperationResult enumeration, or proceed with default processing by returning the corresponding RecordOperationResult value.
The following code examples demonstrate how to register a custom record handler and create a custom declaration filter that manages record declaration and undeclaration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype Microsoft.Office.RecordsManagement.RecordsRepository.RecordOperationResult OnUndeclare(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPListItem item) cil managed
Public Function OnUndeclare (item As SPListItem) As RecordOperationResult

Docs.summary: Represents the event that is triggered when the specified is undeclared.
